did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Henry County (Va.) Election Records, 1863 and undated

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Henry County (Va.) Election Records, 1863 and undated. Local government records collection, Henry County Court Records. The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Va. 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This item came to the Library of Virginia under the accession number 40076.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Henry County was formed in 1776 from Pittsylvania County.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Henry County (Va.) Election Records, 1863 and undated. The collection contains four items: a poll taken at Irisburg for Delegate to the Virginia Legislature in May 1863; a poll held at Oak Level for Governor of Virginia, May 1863; a poll taken for the House of Delegates for Henry County, undated; and a poll taken for the State Senate for the Patrick, Henry, and Franklin Senatorial District, undated.
